H0.text: Which poet was married to Ted Hughes until her death in 1963. Sylvia Plath

H1.text: Which poet was married to Ted Hughes until her death in 1963. Assia Wevill

H2.text: Which poet was married to Ted Hughes until her death in 1963. Anne Sexton

H3.text: Which poet was married to Ted Hughes until her death in 1963. Plathian

A4.text: She married fellow poet Ted Hughes in 1956 in London.

A5.text: In July 1962, Plath discovered Hughes was having an affair with Wevill.
